summary:
Immerse yourself in the world of Igor van Gemert, the mastermind orchestrating the symphony of disruptive technologies. With deep roots in artificial intelligence and a PhD in virtual reality technologies, his work truly brings the future to our doorstep. As the entrepreneurial force behind numerous successful startups, van Gemert constantly pushes the boundaries of the possible, turning tomorrow's visions into today's realities.

His monumental contribution to smart cities simulation through 'Sim CI' revolutionized our approach to urban planning and sustainability. Yet, this was just one piece of the larger puzzle. Van Gemert's open-source authorship of the OCHP protocol has placed him in the annals of EV history. His innovative ideas have left an indelible footprint on every EV-powered car across the globe, establishing the OCHP protocol as the definitive standard in electric mobility.

A master at navigating the complexities of technology teams, van Gemert knows how to lead with innovation while ensuring competitive advantage. Discover how he navigates this ever-evolving landscape, pioneering solutions that don't just disrupt industries but shape the future of humanity itself. Enter the world of Igor van Gemert: a nexus of intelligence, innovation, and technological disruption.

Founder and owner https:// ResilientShield.nl/
Lead CyberSecurity and Artificial Intelligence at https://ITsPeople.nl/
Advisory board https://www.axite-securitytools.com/

projects.title: Morpheus Video AI Video project (business dev / business planning)
NIS2Comply.eu
projects.description:
Author of NIS2Comply.eu

Multidisciplinary Approach: Many platforms focus on just one perspective, but by covering NIS2 from the standpoint of Legal Counsel, CFO, CTO, and CISO, you're ensuring that users get a 360-degree view of the regulations. Each role brings a unique viewpoint to the table, and your platform harmonizes these different insights.

Targeted Learning: Instead of a one-size-fits-all approach, professionals can delve deep into content that's directly relevant to their role and responsibilities. A CFO might be more interested in financial implications and risk management, while a CTO would prioritize technological solutions and infrastructure. Your platform caters to these specific needs.

Practical Compliance: NIS2 isn't just about understanding the regulations – it's about implementing them in a practical, real-world setting. By offering insights from different professional perspectives, you're giving organizations the tools they need to not just understand NIS2, but to act on it.

Engaging E-Learning Experience: Traditional compliance training can be dry and unengaging. If you've utilized modern e-learning methodologies, it can make the process more interactive and user-friendly, which could lead to better retention and application of the knowledge.

Up-to-Date Insights: Given the evolving nature of cyber threats and regulations, it's essential to stay updated. If your platform offers periodic updates or has mechanisms to incorporate new developments, that's another significant advantage.

projects.title: INtelligent robust ArchitecturE for TIme Critical Systems (INAETICS)
projects.description: The INAETICS goal is to define and demonstrate a dynamic service oriented reference architecture that addresses the requirements of time critical systems in a broad range of domains by providing a single design and implementation space for all subsystems, irrespective of control strategy. By providing system-wide consistency and avoiding architectural impedance intermediaries the architecture will support organizational as well as functional scalability, allowing adopters to streamline and accelerate their entire product lifecycle.

profile_positions.description:
As businesses grapple with the challenges that impact their business, such as AI, data science, data-driven operations, cloud transformations, IOT, remote work, Vendor management, etc., they face increased security risks. To help companies meet these challenges, ITsPeople has appointed Igor van Gemert #igorvangemert as ITs cybersecurity lead

Van Gemert brings 15+ years of experience in IT and OT security, focusing on risk management, strategy development, incident response, and secure technology deployment.

At ITsPeople, Van Gemert will be responsible for strengthening and expanding cybersecurity services and developing solutions to protect critical infrastructure. His expertise in AI technologies enables him to help companies implement these securely and responsibly. His expertise and knowledge of NIS2 and the EU Cyber Resilience Act will ensure compliance with applicable regulations.
profile_positions.title: Lead CyberSecurity at ITsPeople

profile_positions.description: ResilientShield was set up by Igor van Gemert, who has been active as a specialist in the field of cyber security since he was 27. He is therefore no stranger to the world of critical infrastructure. He recently completed his work as CEO and founder of SIM-CI (as of 01 April) and decided to focus entirely on cyber security. This is also no superfluous luxury at the moment, the cyber security problem is still completely underestimated by many companies. He and his team therefore try, apart from raising awareness, to provide practical solutions in which the problems can be mitigated in a good way. By means of role plays and available technology, they try to achieve an optimal balance between business continuity and costs. The legal framework from GDPR and the Data Leakage Act are therefore not disregarded in this context.
profile_positions.title: CEO & founder

profile_positions.description:
SIM-CI offers CI owners and asset managers a cloud based suite of solutions spanning from high level strategic focus to day-to-day operations. It offers network owners and governmental bodies the tools to bolster their critical infrastructure networks against current and future risk. Applying near-real time 3D/VR/AR projections and simulations, SIM-CI offers in-depth insights into critical infrastructure interdependencies, vulnerabilities, potential risks and the current status of assets. By allowing you to foresee, identify and assess the impact of events (planned or unplanned) upon your operations, you are able to take action to mitigate damage, maintain the network and optimize performance.
SIM-CI currently employs over 50 highly skilled scientists and AI/VR/GIS developers dedicated to securing and optimizing critical infrastructures.
profile_positions.title: CEO & founder

profile_positions.description:
Sales and Business Development Manager with a dedicated focus on brands and (interactive) advertising agencies and Telco's.

Ex Machina's proprietary Connected Games Management System, brings together Ex Machina's core products into one holistic, crossmedia platform. It is unique in the sense that through a single platform it allows the customer to gain full control over launching and managing any single, multiplayer and community game whether on web, mobile (Iphone, Android, Smartphones with html5, Ipad) or TV.

Our mission playing games on any device, anytime, anywhere.

Partner selection and revenue management.
Second Screen (Ipad) Revenue models.
Business development/planning.
Concept development. 
(mobile) Strategy.
Deal making.
profile_positions.title: Sales and Business Development Manager Ad Interim

profile_positions.description:
Job description: business and concept development

I was on a meeting at ING bank in Rotterdam where I talked with Leen Zevenbergen CEO of Escador.com His story was quite interesting. We talked and we had a interesting click. He asked me one question : " Tell me what do you like and what are your strong points..". I answered with the following response : "I like the unknown arena. Thinking about business applications for mobile operators and develop tangible prototypes." He talked about innovation and creating paradigm shifts for large companies. So he finally offered me a job as a IT/Business consultant in the DARE project. This project was something completely new in the Netherlands. It was all about finding the intrinsic value proposition from one company and combine it with another. To make this happen I was enabled to lead a small team(5) with people for desk research etc. We created a 3 stage approach : stage 1 desk research (by 2 people from Nijenrode University, stage 2 Business Case analysis, Stage 3  Find the intrinsic value and determine the low hanging fruits if you would combine this with another company. So I made all kinds of business combinations between KPN and several top 100 company's in the Netherlands.  This resulted in various joint ventures between KPN and NS,KLM etc. For each company combination my challenge was to develop at least 10 new concepts. These concepts were tested in the board of directors meetings at the DARE sessions in Den Dolder. Some of them are realized. So you seem them after 1,5 years TV in Trains, Business dating in the sky for KLM, WIFI hotspots on train stations etc. I learned that good ideas can be produced and implemented in a structured environment.
profile_positions.title: IT / business consultant

company.name: DMP - Digital Media Production / DMO Ltd

profile_positions.company: DMP - Digital Media Production / DMO Ltd
profile_positions.description:
Business development and production for these projects: 

AT5 Jongerendebat, A new television format which enables Internet and television users to decide/vote on the subjects discussed in a live television program. People were able to vote using a televoting system developed by DMP. Within 1 hour 2000 people used the phone to interact with the program. On the Internet platform 500 people discussed on line using an IRC and a chat application. 
Webmix, A multimedia developed environment which connects Internet and Television. Resulted in push technology platform to broadcast live video combined with HTML pages. The first virtual TV program which uses the web to generate realtime tv content.
Global Dance Connection, Platform for talented dancers using Internet as a virtual dance stage. Multicasting application by way of TCP/IP. Invited by WDR; sent in for the Cyberstar competition. 200 companies took part in this competition. (MIT Philips etc.) Ended in the top 10.
Tolhouse 2000, An experiment in which research is done into the behavior of Internet-users, who are exposed to Internet for a long time. This is a marketing research in which we get an answer to the question which arguments are important for the beginner of Internet using hard & software. This way USP's are acquired which are needed for the sales of hard & software. 
WEB-ROM, Integration of a product catalogue and Website. After having seen the products on the CD-ROM, the consumer can order the products. The order flow is being dealt with by way of Internet (WEB). Because of the CD-ROM's cheap reproduction costs, data entry of the webrom is economically efficient since the customer is able to enter his own data on the Website. By way of trade-shows and other events, the CD-ROM can be distributed. A new sales and marketing instrument.  
JAZZROM, CD-ROM production provided with photographs and sound-fragments of The North Sea Jazz Festival.
